# Discussion

The work presented in this thesis brought together an interdiscplinary approach to expand on previous literature to further explore the contribution of the plasma protoeme and platelet function to obesity-related thrombosis. A summary of pathways explored in each results chapters is displayed in summary Figure \@ref(fig:Thesis-schematic-chaps).
